pr_title: LUCENE-9150: Restore support for dynamic PlanetModel in spatial3d

timeline.bodyText: I think this class should be inside PlanetModel. We should not create any dependency in the geom package and if we keep this class here, then planet model has a decency outside.
timeline.author: iverase

timeline.bodyText: As I said before, we should not have a dependency outside of this package.
timeline.author: iverase

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if instead of adding all those methods, the planet model should just return the docValueEncoder?
timeline.author: iverase

replies.bodyText: I added a getter for the docValueEncoder in PlanetModel
replies.author: nknize

timeline.bodyText: Can we add the three planet models in the random?
timeline.author: iverase

timeline.bodyText: This was added because Math#toDegrees and Math#toRadians were in the forbidden APIs. I believe in master the van has been lifted (java 11) so this is not needed anymore. Not for this PR but good to have it in mind.
timeline.author: iverase
